alert.note: Alert for Washington (Maryland) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Baltimore/Washington (Washington D.C., Central Maryland, Northern Virginia, Eastern West Virginia)
info.headline: Freezing Fog Advisory issued February 26 at 9:22AM EST until February 26 at 10:00AM EST by NWS Baltimore/Washington
info.description: ...FREEZING FOG ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM EST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Visibility one quarter mile in freezing fog. * WHERE...In Maryland, Washington County. In West Virginia, Berkeley and Jefferson Counties. * WHEN...Until 10 AM EST this morning. * IMPACTS...Hazardous driving conditions due to low visibility and potential frost on bridges.
info.instruction: If driving, slow down, use your headlights, and leave plenty of distance ahead of you. Also, be alert for frost on bridge decks causing slippery roads.
